text: First, I'll introduce myselfー
My name is Uehara Shikanosuke.
I'm a student at Gosha Academy, a Taimanin training institution.
At school I'm an unremarkable cadet who's barely scraping byーbut that's not the real me.
Those who make fun of me at school don't know, but in reality I'mー

name: Shinobi Bear
text: GROOOOOOOOGGHH!!!
The roar of a ferocious beast echoed through the nighttime forest.
The beast in front of Shikanosuke was a Shinobi Bear that had been trained for combat.
Its body was large enough that he had to raise his gaze, and it had the strength to smash a tree in halfー
On top of that, it was an extremely dangerous hunter of the nighttime forest, tracking down prey with its un-beastlike high intelligence.

name: Uehara Shikanosuke
text: Damn it!! Am I surroundedー!?
These fiendish beasts encircled Shikanosuke.

name: Ninja
text: You're trapped like a rat, kidー
Then someone who appeared to be a ninja stepped out from behind the Shinobi Bears.
It seemed like this man was leading the ferocious Shinobi Bears.

name: Ninja
text: Give up and hand over what you stole from the mansion. There's nowhere for you to run.
It sounded exactly like the threatening words of a villain.
"What I stole" was a top-secret document that had been kept in the mansion the ninja worked for.
It was evidence of wrongdoings that, if left unchecked, concerned the lives of hundreds of people.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Pfffー
Surrounded, with nowhere to run.
It truly was a desperate situation, but Shikanosuke smiled boldly.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Nowhere to run? The same goes for you!

name: Ninja
text: What...?
The ninja tilted his head in confusion at the seemingly weak Shikanosuke's surprising retort.
Was this pipsqueak still going to fight back?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hmphーlisten here, evil ninja. I'm going to give you a special treat and show you the power of the "real me."
Shikanosuke brandished his ninjato and whispered with his eyes closed.

name: Shikanosuke
text: "Seal Undone"ーrelease the Devildomian Power bound within my left hand.
At the same timeー
A sparking, black radiance covered the arm in which Shikanosuke held his ninjato.

name: Ninja
text: What!? You bastard, what is that power!!?
The ninja was thunderstruck.
The Shinobi Bears also roared with astonished expressions.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Haha, do you see this radiance? This is the jet-black lightning that is said to strike in the far reaches of the DevildomーThe power of darkness that my lousy dad sealed within me.

name: Ninja
text: N-No wayーAre you the descendant of the "Dark Lightning Taimanin!?"

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hahahaha!! Once you've realized, it's already too late!!
Shikanosuke laughed loudly and held his ninjato in a cool pose.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Take this, you villains!! I'll punish each and every one of you!!
